member.name: hit
member.desc: ''true'' if the ray has hit something, otherwise ''false''.

member.name: entity
member.desc: The entity that has been hit by the ray.

member.name: physObj
member.desc: The physics object that has been hit by the ray.

member.name: fraction
member.desc: A value in the range [0,1], representing where the ray has hit the target. 0 means the target was hit at the ray start position, 1 means the target was hit at the ray destination position.

member.name: distance
member.desc: The distance from the start position at which the ray hit the target.

member.name: normal
member.desc: The surface normal of the hit target at the position where it was hit by the ray.

member.name: startPosition
member.desc: The start position of the ray.

member.name: colObj
member.desc: The collision object that was hit by the ray.

member.name: mesh
member.desc: The mesh that was hit by the ray.

member.name: subMesh
member.desc: The sub-mesh that was hit by the ray.

member.name: material
member.desc: The material that was hit by the ray.

member.name: materialName
member.desc: The name of the material that was hit by the ray.
